title: Font Help
content:
Working to try and get this font from the Top Nav images. Want to create a new one but do not have the original PSD file.  
 [http://www.lovelivetrain.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019064138/http:/www.lovelivetrain.com/ "http://www.lovelivetrain.com/")

The top menu of Home through Start. What is that font?
author: tylermiller88

comments.content: If it's the same font as used on these tab headers (" [News.Blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019064138/http:/lovelivetrain.nationbuilder.com/themes/1/509bce0978c272142d000001/0/attachments/13523889351367894344/default/bg_tab-news.png)", " [Studio.Events](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019064138/http:/lovelivetrain.nationbuilder.com/themes/1/509bce0978c272142d000001/0/attachments/13523889351367894344/default/bg_tab-classes.png)", " [Follow.Me](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019064138/http:/lovelivetrain.nationbuilder.com/themes/1/509bce0978c272142d000001/0/attachments/13523889351367894344/default/bg_tab-social.png)", what I believe), should be [Aller](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019064138/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Aller).
